title: Massachusetts Firm Recalls Buffalo Style Chicken Salad Products That May Contain Foreign Materials
summary: Editor's Note, May 11, 2010: The recall release issued May 5, 2010 has been corrected, as it inadvertently stated that "the retail distribution list(s) will be posted on the FSIS Web site." FSIS does not post retail distribution lists for Class II and III recalls...

establishment.name: Boston Salads and Provisions Company Inc.

impacted_products: 5-pound containers of "BOSTON SALADS BUFFALO STYLE CHICKEN SALAD."
